name: KILLRUN
description:
SPEEDRUNNING AND PARKOUR //

Speed is the game but you'll only collect all the stars by creating your own routes and mastering strafing, strafe hopping, and sliding.

RUN N' GUN //

Feel every bullet rip through the simulation. Snapshots, noscopes, and reflexes are alive and kicking. The gunplay in KILLRUN is not for the faint of heart with BULKHEAD's signature gunplay and focus on 'feelback'.

LEADERBOARDS //

Compete against yourself and others. Use the friends only leaderboards to set the bar for the real competition.

JUMPER //

No KILL. All RUN. For the pacifist inside you with a 100% movement focus. Move, groove and conquer the leaderboards without firing a shot in KILLRUN's JUMPER game mode.

OVER 60 MAPS & COUNTING //

KILLRUN will see players work their way across a multitude of maps of varying lengths, times and difficulties with more still to come!

UNLOCKABLE WEAPONS //

Unlock 'MOD KITS' by completing and competing against the PRO times and earning stars across your runs.
